resources.title: Layout Using the Flex API
resources.name: layout_flex
resources.description: Documentation and examples for using the Flex layout API in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about flex based layout or when you design or build containers, pages or components that rely on Flex layout behaviour.

resources.title: Layout Using Grid List
resources.name: layout_grid_list
resources.description: Documentation for the Grid List layout pattern in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about grid based page layout or when you design or build views that arrange content in grid lists.

resources.title: Side Navigation Panels
resources.name: layout_side_navigation_panels
resources.description: Documentation for side navigation panels in Dropinbase layouts. Use this resource whenever a user asks about side menus, navigation drawers or panel behaviour or when you design or build layouts that include side navigation.

resources.title: Application Menu & Layout
resources.name: layout_application_menu_layout
resources.description: Documentation for the overall application menu and layout structure in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about global navigation, app shells or menu layout or when you design a project level layout for an application.

resources.title: Splitter
resources.name: layout_splitter
resources.description: Documentation for splitter layouts that resize panels in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about resizable panes or split views or when you build layouts that allow users to drag and resize sections.

resources.title: Data Components - Check
resources.name: built_in_data_check
resources.description: Documentation for check based data components such as checkboxes in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about check controls or when you design forms, grids or filters that use check style inputs.

resources.title: Data Components - Selects
resources.name: built_in_data_selects
resources.description: Documentation for select style data components in Dropinbase, including drop downs and similar selectors. Use this resource whenever a user asks about select fields or when you design components that require choosing values from a list.

resources.title: Data Components - Date/Time
resources.name: built_in_data_datetime
resources.description: Documentation for date and time data components in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks how to capture or display dates and times or when you design forms or grids that work with temporal data.

resources.title: Data Components - Files
resources.name: built_in_data_files
resources.description: Documentation for file upload and file related data components in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about file handling or when you build features that upload, attach or manage files.

resources.title: Data Components - Inputs
resources.name: built_in_data_inputs
resources.description: Documentation for standard input data components such as text and numeric fields in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about input fields or when you design data entry screens using these components.

resources.title: Layout - Application
resources.name: built_in_layout_application
resources.description: Documentation for application level layout components in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about structuring the whole app view or when you design top level application containers.

resources.title: Layout - Component
resources.name: built_in_layout_component
resources.description: Documentation for component level layout patterns in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about arranging elements within a component or when you design reusable component layouts.

resources.title: Buttons
resources.name: built_in_buttons
resources.description: Documentation for standard button components in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about button styles or actions or when you design interaction flows that rely on buttons.

resources.title: Buttons - Data
resources.name: built_in_buttons_data
resources.description: Documentation for data aware buttons such as save, delete or row actions in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about buttons that manipulate data or when you design data workflows triggered by buttons.

resources.title: Calendar
resources.name: built_in_calendar
resources.description: Documentation for calendar components in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about calendar views or scheduling or when you design interfaces that show events on a calendar.

resources.title: Other Components
resources.name: built_in_other_components
resources.description: Documentation for additional built in components in Dropinbase that do not fall under a specific category. Use this resource whenever a user asks about miscellaneous components or when you design features that use these extra elements.

resources.title: SelectMulti Component on Forms
resources.name: built_in_selectmulti_forms
resources.description: Documentation for the SelectMulti component when used on forms in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about multi value selection on forms or when you design forms that require selecting multiple records.

resources.title: Typography
resources.name: built_in_typography
resources.description: Documentation for typography and text styling in Dropinbase components. Use this resource whenever a user asks about text appearance or when you design layouts that rely heavily on headings, labels and body text.

resources.title: Grid Basics
resources.name: container_grids_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for grid containers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about how grids work or when you start designing data views based on grid containers.

resources.title: SQL Grid
resources.name: container_grids_sql_grid
resources.description: Documentation for SQL based grid containers that load data directly from SQL in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about SQL grids or when you design data views backed by SQL queries.

resources.title: Parent and Other Fields on Grids
resources.name: container_grids_parent_fields
resources.description: Documentation for parent fields and related columns on grid containers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks how to show parent information on grids or when you design relational data views in grids.

resources.title: Table Grid Custom Columns
resources.name: container_grids_table_custom_columns
resources.description: Documentation for adding custom columns to table grids in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about computed or custom grid columns or when you design grids that show derived values.

resources.title: SQL Grid Custom Columns
resources.name: container_grids_sql_custom_columns
resources.description: Documentation for creating custom columns in SQL grids in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about extending SQL based grids with extra columns or when you design advanced SQL grid layouts.

resources.title: Grid Headers And Styling
resources.name: container_grids_headers_styling
resources.description: Documentation for grid header configuration and styling in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about header appearance or when you design grids that need custom header layouts.

resources.title: Grid Freeze Columns
resources.name: container_grids_freeze_columns
resources.description: Documentation for freezing columns in grid containers so they stay visible while scrolling. Use this resource whenever a user asks about frozen columns or when you design wide grids where key columns must stay fixed.

resources.title: Row Selection and Values
resources.name: container_grids_row_selection_values
resources.description: Documentation for row selection behaviour and selected value handling in Dropinbase grids. Use this resource whenever a user asks how selection works or when you design workflows that depend on selected grid rows.

resources.title: Batch Edit Grid
resources.name: container_grids_batch_edit
resources.description: Documentation for batch editing capabilities on grid containers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about editing multiple records at once or when you design bulk update experiences.

resources.title: Batch Toggle Edit Grid
resources.name: container_grids_batch_toggle_edit
resources.description: Documentation for batch toggle editing on grids in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about toggling flags or statuses in bulk or when you design grids that support many simultaneous changes.

resources.title: Single Edit Grid
resources.name: container_grids_single_edit
resources.description: Documentation for single record editing within grid containers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about inline editing rows or when you design grids that support editing one row at a time.

resources.title: Grid Height
resources.name: container_grids_height
resources.description: Documentation for controlling grid height and scroll behaviour in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about grid sizing or when you design layouts where grid height must be tuned carefully.

resources.title: Dynamic Columns
resources.name: container_grids_dynamic_columns
resources.description: Documentation for dynamic grid columns whose visibility or definition changes at runtime in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about configurable columns or when you design highly flexible grid views.

resources.title: Form Basics
resources.name: container_forms_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for form containers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks how forms are structured or when you design basic data capture forms.

resources.title: Parent and Other Fields on Forms
resources.name: container_forms_parent_fields
resources.description: Documentation for using parent and related fields on forms in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about showing parent data on forms or when you design relational forms connected to other containers.

resources.title: Plain Container
resources.name: container_plain
resources.description: Documentation for plain containers in Dropinbase that provide flexible layout with minimal behaviour. Use this resource whenever a user asks about simple container types or when you design lightweight views without grid or form behaviour.

resources.title: iFrame with Eleutheria
resources.name: container_iframes_eleutheria
resources.description: Documentation for iFrame containers that integrate with Eleutheria in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about embedding Eleutheria content or when you design projects that show Eleutheria pages inside Dropinbase.

resources.title: iFrame with PHP
resources.name: container_iframes_php
resources.description: Documentation for iFrame containers that host PHP driven content in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about embedding PHP pages or when you design hybrid solutions that mix PHP and Dropinbase.

resources.title: iFrame Dropinbase Functions
resources.name: container_iframes_dib_functions
resources.description: Documentation for iFrame containers that make use of Dropinbase functions from embedded content. Use this resource whenever a user asks about iFrame to Dropinbase interaction or when you design advanced integrations using iFrames.

resources.title: Tree (Custom Controller)
resources.name: container_trees_custom_controller
resources.description: Documentation for tree containers that use a custom controller in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about tree structures managed by custom logic or when you design hierarchical views with specialised behaviour.

resources.title: Grid Tree (Custom Controller)
resources.name: container_grid_trees_custom_controller
resources.description: Documentation for grid tree containers with custom controllers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about combined grid and tree views or when you design hierarchical data grids controlled by custom logic.

resources.title: Client-side Validation
resources.name: validation_client_side
resources.description: Documentation for client side validation techniques in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about validating input in the browser or when you design forms that must give immediate feedback to users.

resources.title: Server-side Validation
resources.name: validation_server_side
resources.description: Documentation for server side validation in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about validating data on the server or when you design workflows that must enforce rules beyond the browser.

resources.title: Ports and Subcontainer Basics
resources.name: ports_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for ports and subcontainers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks what ports are or when you design architectures that route data or views through ports.

resources.title: Port Windows
resources.name: ports_windows
resources.description: Documentation for port windows in Dropinbase which display content in separate windows triggered by ports. Use this resource whenever a user asks about window based navigation or when you design multi window flows using ports.

resources.title: Port Dialogs
resources.name: ports_dialogs
resources.description: Documentation for port driven dialogs in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about opening dialogs from ports or when you design modal interactions triggered by navigation or actions.

resources.title: Navigation Basics
resources.name: navigation_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for navigation in Dropinbase applications. Use this resource whenever a user asks how navigation works or when you design menu structures and navigation flows.

resources.title: SQL Parameters
resources.name: sql_parameters
resources.description: Documentation for SQL parameters in Dropinbase such as passing values into SQL queries. Use this resource whenever a user asks about parameterised SQL or when you design data flows that depend on SQL parameters.

resources.title: PHP Parameters
resources.name: php_parameters
resources.description: Documentation for PHP parameters used with Dropinbase integrations. Use this resource whenever a user asks how PHP receives or sends parameters or when you design features that call PHP code from Dropinbase.

resources.title: Client Data Basics
resources.name: client_data_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for client data in Dropinbase and how it is passed between components. Use this resource whenever a user asks about clientData or when you design flows that depend on passing context between screens.

resources.title: Event Basics
resources.name: events_basics
resources.description: Documentation for the basic event model in Dropinbase including how events are defined and triggered. Use this resource whenever a user asks about events or when you design actions that run on user interaction or data changes.

resources.title: Queues - for Long Running Events
resources.name: events_queues_long_running
resources.description: Documentation for queues that handle long running events in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about background processing or when you design workflows that need queued or asynchronous execution.

resources.title: *ngIf
resources.name: conditional_ng_if
resources.description: Documentation for the *ngIf conditional directive in Dropinbase examples. Use this resource whenever a user asks about conditionally showing or hiding content with *ngIf or when you design components that depend on Angular style conditions.

resources.title: [hidden]
resources.name: conditional_hidden
resources.description: Documentation for using the [hidden] directive to hide or show elements in Dropinbase examples. Use this resource whenever a user asks about [hidden] behaviour or when you design layouts where visibility is controlled through this directive.

resources.title: [dibDisabled]
resources.name: conditional_dib_disabled
resources.description: Documentation for the [dibDisabled] directive that controls disabled state in Dropinbase components. Use this resource whenever a user asks about conditionally disabling controls or when you design forms and buttons that must enable or disable based on logic.

resources.title: [ngStyle]
resources.name: conditional_ng_style
resources.description: Documentation for using [ngStyle] to apply dynamic styles in Dropinbase examples. Use this resource whenever a user asks about styling elements based on data or when you design components whose appearance changes at runtime.

resources.title: Dropinbase Services
resources.name: dropinbase_services
resources.description: Documentation for Dropinbase services and how they are used from components and events. Use this resource whenever a user asks about built in services or when you design features that call Dropinbase service functions.

resources.title: Client-Side Default Values
resources.name: defaults_client_side
resources.description: Documentation for client side default values in Dropinbase and how they are initialised. Use this resource whenever a user asks about defaults applied in the browser or when you design forms that prefill values on the client.

resources.title: Server-Side Default Values
resources.name: defaults_server_side
resources.description: Documentation for server side default values in Dropinbase and how they are applied on the backend. Use this resource whenever a user asks about defaults enforced on the server or when you design flows that depend on backend initialisation.

resources.title: Filter Grids and Forms
resources.name: filters_grids_forms
resources.description: Documentation for filtering both grids and forms in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about applying filters to data containers or when you design search and filter behaviour across views.

resources.title: Filtering Forms
resources.name: filters_filtering_forms
resources.description: Documentation for filtering form containers in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about filter forms or when you design dedicated filter interfaces that drive other containers.

resources.title: Using Filters with Ports
resources.name: filters_with_ports
resources.description: Documentation for using filters together with ports in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about passing filter values via ports or when you design navigation flows that depend on filter state.

resources.title: Data Components - Selects
resources.name: filter_dropdown_selects
resources.description: Documentation for using select based filter drop downs in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about dropdown filters or when you design filter bars that use select components.

resources.title: Custom Ng Component In Grid
resources.name: custom_component_ng_grid
resources.description: Documentation for embedding custom Angular components inside Dropinbase grids. Use this resource whenever a user asks about custom cell renderers or when you design grids that host bespoke Angular components.

resources.title: PHP Basics
resources.name: php_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for using PHP together with Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about PHP integration or when you design solutions that rely on PHP scripts alongside Dropinbase containers.

resources.title: PHP Database Functions
resources.name: php_database_functions
resources.description: Documentation for PHP database helper functions used with Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about PHP side database access or when you design features that query data from PHP code.

resources.title: PHP Files - DibExcel Dropin
resources.name: php_files_dibexcel
resources.description: Documentation for the DibExcel PHP dropin that works with Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about Excel export or when you design reporting or data extract features that use DibExcel.

resources.title: PHP Files - DPdf Class
resources.name: php_files_dpdf
resources.description: Documentation for the DPdf PHP class used to generate PDFs in Dropinbase solutions. Use this resource whenever a user asks about PDF generation or when you design features that create PDF output.

resources.title: PHP Files - Eleutheria Class
resources.name: php_files_eleutheria
resources.description: Documentation for the Eleutheria PHP class used with Dropinbase integrations. Use this resource whenever a user asks about Eleutheria related PHP logic or when you design back end code that works with Eleutheria.

resources.title: PHP - Concurrent Asynchronous Threads
resources.name: php_concurrent_threads
resources.description: Documentation for concurrent asynchronous PHP threads used with Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about running PHP tasks in parallel or when you design high performance background processing.

resources.title: PHP - Send Emails
resources.name: php_send_emails
resources.description: Documentation for sending emails from PHP in Dropinbase based solutions. Use this resource whenever a user asks about email sending or when you design notification features driven by PHP scripts.

resources.title: Container Permissions
resources.name: permissions_container
resources.description: Documentation for container level permissions in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about controlling access to containers or when you design security for views at container level.

resources.title: Item Permissions
resources.name: permissions_item
resources.description: Documentation for item level permissions in Dropinbase such as row or record access. Use this resource whenever a user asks about fine grained permissions or when you design solutions that restrict access per item.

resources.title: Segmenting Data By User
resources.name: permissions_segment_by_user
resources.description: Documentation for segmenting data by user in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about per user data visibility or when you design multi tenant like solutions where users only see their own data.

resources.title: Report Basics
resources.name: reports_basics
resources.description: Introductory documentation for reports in Dropinbase. Use this resource whenever a user asks about creating or running reports or when you design reporting features for a project.
